answers: Make `yadm clone` work from anywhere. Stop `yadm add .` from trying to add everything / requiring access to all dirs. Allow defaults in templates for when env vars do not exist + error if env var not found and no default.

answers: Can be confusing when first setting up to align shared dotfiles with existing local - `git reset --hard HEAD` seems too forceful. Templates break too easily / don't error when they should.
